channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- nvTIFF Library
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- nvTIFF Library

item.title: CVE-2024-0080|2024-08-01T17:41:15.815Z -- nvidia -- nvtiff%20library
item.description: NVIDIA nvTIFF Library for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability where improper input validation might enable an attacker to use a specially crafted input file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to a partial denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-0080|2024-06-04T17:59:06.732Z -- nvidia -- nvtiff%20library
item.description: NVIDIA nvTIFF Library for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability where improper input validation might enable an attacker to use a specially crafted input file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to a partial denial of service.
